page.title: 07Housing
page.content: IN THE AREA WHERE I LIVE THERE ARE HOUSES LIKE,FARM-HOUSES.THE FARM-HOUSE I USED TO LIVE IN HAD 6 BEDROOMS AND 11 DOORS AND 12 WINDOWS.WE HAD A BATHROOM THAT HAD A WHITE BATH A WHITE SHOWER, A WHITE SINK AND A GREEN TOILET.DOWNSTAIRS WE HAD 3 ROOMS, A KITCHEN,A DINING ROOM AND A SITTING ROOM IT WAS REALLY GOOD.IT WAS THE BEST PLACE WE EVER LIVED IN.WE NOW LIVE IN A TERRACED HOUSE WHICH HAS 3 BEDROOMS,9 DOORS AMD 3 ROOMS DOWNSTAIRS, IT HAS 7 WINDOWS INCUDING THE BATHROOM,WHICH IS DOWNSTAIRS.SOMETIMES WE GO TO MY AUNTIES WHICH IS IN TRIMDON COLLIERY. SHE LIVES IN A BUNGALOW WHICH ONLY HAS ONE BEDROOM AND 2 ROOMS OTHERWISE.IT HAS A KITCHEN,A SITTING ROOM AND A BATHROOM.IT HAS ABOUT 6 DOORS AS WELL. CAROLINE ATKINSON
